snippet: Kolton Houston went to extraordinary lengths to rid his body of steroids, and three and a half years after arriving at Georgia, he finally played in a game.
lead_paragraph: Kolton Houston went to extraordinary lengths to rid his body of steroids, and three and a half years after arriving at Georgia, he finally played in a game.

headline.main: Georgia Tackle Overcomes a Stubborn Foe: Steroids
headline.print_headline: Georgia Tackle Overcomes a Stubborn Foe: Steroids
